title: Add Birthday Bonus to Loyalty Account
description: As part of the loyalty program, customers receive bonus points on their birthday. The system needs to automate this.

tasks.description: Each day, query the customer database for all customers whose birthday is today.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of customers celebrating their birthday.

tasks.description: For each customer on the list, add 100 bonus points to their loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully updates the loyalty balance for all eligible customers.

tasks.description: Send each customer a 'Happy Birthday' email mentioning their bonus points.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a personalized birthday email.
